data.actual_result: Because it thinks it's established a connection, it doesn't know what to do and freezes.
data.expected_result: Discord would keep trying to reconnect
data.short_description: Disconnecting from internet between the updating and connecting will completely freeze Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Start Discord up, wait for it to stop looking for updates - Just as it begins to say "STARTING", disable your wifi - Instead of attempting to reconnect, the entire client will just blank out and freeze. (see here: https://i.gyazo.com/bb14e5dd357d3315f77d147418dd7f7c.gif ). ####Additional steps:- Load the app - Just before the Update part concludes, kill your internet connection
